items.sentence: Tom is usually very polite, but today he was quite rude.

I don't think that TV will ever take the place of books.

I don't have time to drive to Boston, so I'll fly there.
Tom drove all the way from Boston to Chicago in one day.
I searched in my pocket for a coin to make a phone call.
Several yachts were sailing side by side far out at sea.
We received instructions on how to make a bamboo basket.
My daughter lost almost all the coins she had collected.
I learned how to spin wool from watching my grandmother.
I asked Tom for the recipe, but he said it was a secret.
There were places en route where the snow was knee-deep.
She's alive! She was drowning, but her father saved her.
I saw Tom last night, or rather very early this morning.
Tom works at the store across the street from his house.
I'm completely satisfied with the way things turned out.
I should probably start thinking about buying a new car.
